title: Navigate to the application
description: Verify the application loads correctly at http://localhost:5173

title: Upload File A (CSV)
description: Test uploading a CSV file as File A
steps: Click on File A upload area
Verify file is uploaded and displayed

title: Upload File B (JSON)
description: Test uploading a JSON file as File B
steps: Click on File B upload area
Verify file is uploaded and displayed

title: Use Demo Data
description: Test loading demo data with one click
steps: Verify user is taken to column mapping step

title: File Validation - Invalid Format
description: Verify system shows error for invalid file formats
steps: Click on File A upload area
Select a file with invalid format (e.g., .txt)

title: Automatic Column Detection
description: Verify system automatically detects and suggests column mappings
steps: Upload files or use demo data
Verify system suggests mappings for docNo, party, date, amount, tax

title: Manual Column Mapping
description: Verify user can manually adjust column mappings
steps: Change a column mapping using dropdown

title: Proceed to Reconciliation
description: Verify user can proceed to reconciliation after mapping columns
steps: Complete column mapping for both files

title: View Dashboard Summary
description: Verify dashboard displays summary statistics
steps: Verify summary cards are displayed with total records, matched count, partial count, unmatched counts, and amount variance

title: View Results Table
description: Verify results table displays reconciliation results
steps: Verify table displays all reconciliation results

title: Color Coding - Matched Records
description: Verify matched records are displayed in green
steps: Verify matched records have green background

title: Color Coding - Partial Matches
description: Verify partial matches are displayed in yellow
steps: Verify partial matches have yellow background

title: Color Coding - Unmatched Records
description: Verify unmatched records are displayed in red
steps: Verify unmatched records have red background

title: Filter by Match Type
description: Verify user can filter results by match type
steps: Verify only matched records are displayed

title: Search by Document Number
description: Verify user can search results by document number
steps: Enter a document number in search field

title: Filter by Party Name
description: Verify user can filter results by party name
steps: Enter a party name in party filter

title: Configure Amount Tolerance
description: Verify user can adjust amount tolerance
steps: Verify reconciliation runs with new tolerance

title: Configure Date Tolerance
description: Verify user can adjust date tolerance
steps: Verify reconciliation runs with new tolerance

title: Export Results to CSV
description: Verify user can export all results to CSV

title: Export Filtered Results
description: Verify user can export filtered results to CSV
steps: Apply a filter (e.g., show only matched records)
Verify CSV file contains only filtered results

title: View Insights Panel
description: Verify insights panel displays recommendations

title: Step Indicator Display
description: Verify step indicator shows current step
steps: Verify step indicator highlights current step

title: Reset/Start Over
description: Verify user can reset and start over
steps: Verify application returns to upload step
